mapper.select: SELECT c.car_id, m.model_brand, m.model_name, c.car_grade, c.car_category, c.car_status, p.parking_name FROM car c LEFT JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id LEFT JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id WHERE p.parking_district = '수원시';

SELECT c.car_id, c.car_grade, c.car_category, c.car_status, c.car_options, c.car_fuel, c.car_year, p.parking_name, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_transmission, m.model_seate_num, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day FROM car c LEFT JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id WHERE c.car_id = #{carId};
mapper.update: UPDATE car c LEFT JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id SET c.car_grade = #{carGrad}, c.car_category = #{carCategory}, c.car_status = #{carStatus}, c.car_options = #{carOptions}, c.car_fuel = #{carFuel}, c.car_year = #{carYear}, p.parking_name = #{parkingName}, m.model_brand = #{modelBrand}, m.model_name = #{modelName}, m.model_category = #{modelCategory}, m.model_transmission = #{modelTransmission}, m.model_seate_num = #{modelSeateNum}, m.model_amount_hour = #{modelAmountHour}, m.model_amount_day = #{modelAmountDay} WHERE car_id = #{CarId};
